  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractNativeBuildRule
    Abstract class for building native object files and libraries.
    Archive
    A BuildRule which builds an "ar" archive from input files represented as SourcePath.
    Archives
    A utility class containing helper methods for working with "ar" archives.
    ArchiveStep
    Create an object archive with ar.
    CompilerStep
    Call the given C/C++ compiler.

    CxxBinaryDescription.Arg

    A build rule which preprocesses, compiles, and assembles a C/C++ source.
    CxxCompileStep
    A step that preprocesses, compiles, and assembles C/C++ sources.
    CxxDescriptionEnhancer  
    CxxHeader
    A BuildRule representing the contents and namespace layout of a group of headers.
    CxxHeaderSourceSpec  
    CxxLibrary
    An action graph representation of a C/C++ library from the target graph, providing the various interfaces to make it consumable by C/C++ preprocessing and native linkable rules.
    CxxLibraryDescription  
    CxxLibraryDescription.Arg  
    CxxLink  
    CxxLinkableEnhancer  
    CxxLinkables  
    CxxLinkStep  
    CxxPreprocessables  
    CxxPreprocessorInput
    The components that get contributed to a top-level run of the C++ preprocessor.
    CxxSource
    Describes a C/C++ source and the various paths it uses from input to output.
    NativeLinkableInput
    A class containing inputs to be passed to the native linker.
